body: > [!IMPORTANT] > Remove `sourceObservationId` handling in `createEvalJobs` in `evalService.ts`, using `observationId` from event directly. > > - **Behavior**: > - In `createEvalJobs` in `evalService.ts`, remove `sourceObservationId` from dataset item queries and logic. > - Use `observationId` from event directly, setting it to `undefined` if not present. > - **Database Queries**: > - Update SQL queries in `createEvalJobs` to exclude `sourceObservationId` from `dataset_items` and `dataset_run_items` tables. > - **Job Creation**: > - Set `jobInputObservationId` to `observationId` or `null` in job creation logic. > > This description was created by [](https://www.ellipsis.dev?ref=langfuse%2Flangfuse&utm_source=github&utm_medium=referral) for 5cc50865e87a5f80f886ed774bd2e83ec79ba1a7. It will automatically update as commits are pushed.
